article.title: Fiducial, total and differential cross-section measurements of $t$-channel single top-quark production in $pp$ collisions at 8 TeV using data collected by the ATLAS detector

multiple_choice_question.text: Which Feynman diagram represents single top-quark production via the t-channel exchange of a virtual W* boson?
In the observed distribution of missing transverse momentum (EmissT) for the e+ channel (Figure 2a), which background contributes the most events in the range of 50 GeV < EmissT < 100 GeV?
Which input variable to the neural network exhibits the strongest separation between the tq signal and the W+jets background in the l+ SR?
According to Figure 4a, what approximate value of the neural network discriminant (oNN) corresponds to the peak of the top-quark background distribution in the l+ SR?
In Figure 6, the observed oNN distributions in both the l+ SR and l- SR are compared to the model. What do the hatched uncertainty bands represent?
choices: Total uncertainty (statistical and systematic added in quadrature)
